basic.description:
An exploration of the normative underpinnings of democracy, based on a survey of selected historical texts, contemporary theories, and current problems.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: POLS
basic.title: Democratic Theory

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  (12.0 units in POLS at the 200-level or above) and (a GPA of 2.0 on all units in POLS) or permission of the department.
